Welcome to Trollflow2's documentation!
======================================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   launcher
   plugins
   product_list
   logging

Trollflow2 is an operational generation chain runner for Satpy in Linux.

Official support for OS X was dropped in v0.15, but it might still work.
